wenath prakashakayin laba athi chanda sankhyawa 17934 k wana athara eya prathishathayak lesa 1.49% ki.me wana wita mathiwaranaya pawathi diwayine disthrikka 22 asurin disthrikka 20 thapal chandaya prakashayata path kara awasanya.ema disthrikka 20 athurin 18 k jaya ganimata janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha samath wi thibe.ee galla,mathara,hambanthota,kaluthara,kolambaa,puththalama,rathnapura,anuradhapura,polonnaruwa,nuwaraeliya,badulla,mahanuwara,mathale,kagalla,monaragala,thrikunamalaya,digamadulla, saha wanni yana disthrikkayi.sarath fonseka mahatha yapanaya saha madakalapuwa, yana disthrikka wala thapal chandaya jayagrahanaya kara atha.mei wana wita aasana 20 ka nila chanda prathipalaya prakashayata path wi athi athara eyin aasana 15 ka jaya himiwa aththe janadhipathiwarayatayi.
